name: Aritzia Manual ER Velocity Report
command:
list warehouses
|
[select a.prtnum,
        season_yr,
        season,
        merch_catg,
        style_en,
        color,
        sz,
        unit_per_case,
        resv_cases,
        pick_qty,
        resv_qty,
        inb_qty,
        coalesce(pick_qty, 0) + coalesce(resv_qty, 0) + coalesce(inb_qty, 0) as total_qty,
        velocity_qty,
        ROUND(velocity_qty * 1.0 / decode(unit_per_case, 0, 1, unit_per_case), 1) restock_rate,
        CASE WHEN unit_per_case is not null THEN ROUND(pick_qty * 1.0 / decode((velocity_qty * 1.0 / 14), 0, 1, (velocity_qty * 1.0 / 14)), 1)
        END AS days_rem,
        b.stoloc AS assign_loc,
        CASE WHEN maxqvl >= 92000 THEN 'BULK'
             WHEN maxqvl >= 14000 THEN 'XL'
             WHEN maxqvl >= 6400 THEN 'M'
             WHEN maxqvl >= 3500 THEN 'S'
             WHEN maxqvl >= 1500 THEN 'XS'
        END AS bin_type,
        d.loc_count
   from (SELECT a.prtnum,
                c.season_yr,
                c.season,
                c.merch_catg,
                c.style_en,
                d1.lngdsc sz,
                d2.lngdsc color,
                ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN b.arecod = 'RESV' THEN untqty
                          END) * 1.0 / count(CASE WHEN b.arecod = 'RESV' THEN untqty
                                       END), 0) AS unit_per_case,
                count(CASE WHEN b.arecod = 'RESV' THEN untqty
                      END) as resv_cases,
                SUM(CASE WHEN b.arecod = 'PICK' THEN untqty
                    END) as pick_qty,
                SUM(CASE WHEN b.arecod = 'RESV' THEN untqty
                    END) as resv_qty,
                d.inb_qty,
                f.velocity_qty
           from inventory_view a
          INNER
           JOIN locmst b
             ON b.stoloc = a.stoloc
          INNER
           JOIN dss_prtmst c
             ON c.prtnum = a.prtnum
            and c.prt_client_id = a.prt_client_id
            and c.wh_id = a.wh_id
          inner
           join prtdsc pd
             on pd.colnam = 'prtnum|prt_client_id|wh_id_tmpl'
            and pd.colval = /*=varchar(*/ nvl(a.prtnum, rtrim(' ')) || '|' || nvl(a.prt_client_id, rtrim(' ')) || '|' || nvl(a.wh_id, rtrim(' ')) /*=)*/
		inner join prtmst pm 
		         ON pm.prtnum = a.prtnum
            and pm.prt_client_id = a.prt_client_id
            and pm.wh_id_tmpl = a.wh_id
			inner join dscmst d1 
			on d1.colnam = 'prtsize'
			and d1.locale_id = 'US_ENGLISH'
			and  d1.colval = pm.prtsize
			inner join dscmst d2
			on d2.colnam = 'prtcolor'
			and d2.locale_id = 'US_ENGLISH'
			and  d2.colval = pm.prtcolor
           LEFT
           JOIN (SELECT prtnum,
                        inb_qty
                   FROM (SELECT a.prtnum,
                                SUM(expqty) - SUM(idnqty) inb_qty
                           FROM rimlin a
                          INNER
                           JOIN rimhdr b
                             ON b.invnum = a.invnum
                            and b.supnum = a.supnum
                            and b.wh_id = a.wh_id
                            and b.client_id = a.client_id
                          WHERE b.invtyp = 'POP'
                            AND a.prtnum IN (SELECT distinct (a.prtnum)
                                               FROM inventory_view a
                                              INNER
                                               JOIN locmst b
                                                 ON b.stoloc = a.stoloc
                                              INNER
                                               JOIN dss_prtmst c
                                                 ON c.prtnum = a.prtnum
                                              WHERE b.arecod in ('PICK', 'RESV', 'PNDPICK')
                                                AND a.invsts = 'AVL')
                          GROUP BY a.prtnum) a
                  WHERE inb_qty > 0) d
             ON d.prtnum = a.prtnum
           LEFT
           JOIN (select prtnum,
                        SUM(shpqty) velocity_qty
                   FROm shipment_line
                  WHERE (schbat LIKE '% E %' OR schbat LIKE '%IC %' OR schbat LIKE '%REP%')
                    AND shpqty <> 0
                  GROUP BY prtnum) f
             ON f.prtnum = a.prtnum
          WHERE b.arecod in ('PICK', 'RESV', 'ELRV')
            AND a.invsts = 'AVL'
            AND c.merch_catg <> 'Gift Item'
          GROUP BY a.prtnum,
                c.merch_catg,
                c.style_en,
                d1.lngdsc,
                d2.lngdsc,
                d.inb_qty,
                c.season_yr,
                c.season,
                f.velocity_qty) a
   LEFT
   JOIN (SELECT distinct (prtnum),
                stoloc
           FROM invsum
          WHERE stoloc IN (SELECT stoloc
                             FROM locmst
                            WHERE asgflg = 1)) b
     ON b.prtnum = a.prtnum
   LEFT
   JOIN (SELECT stoloc,
                maxqvl
           FROM locmst
          WHERE asgflg = 1) c
     ON c.stoloc = b.stoloc
   LEFT
   JOIN (SELECT prtnum,
                count(a.stoloc) AS loc_count
           FROM inventory_view a
          INNER
           JOIN locmst b
             ON b.stoloc = a.stoloc
          WHERE b.arecod = 'PICK'
          GROUP BY prtnum) d
     ON d.prtnum = a.prtnum
  ORDER BY restock_rate desc,
        days_rem asc] catch(@?) >> res
|
if (@? = 0)
{
    expand environment variable
     where name = '$' || @wh_id || 'outputs' || '\Inventory Velocity\'
    |
    publish data
     where path = @value
    |
    write csv file
     where resdata = @res
       and filnam = 'inv_mer_velocity_' || to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD-HH24MISS') || '.csv'
       and path = @path
}
